Package com.flipfit.business

Interface FlipFitCustomerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCustomerService
public interface FlipFitCustomerInterface
Interface defining operations related to customers in the FlipFit system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    bookSlot(String customerId, Date date, String slotId, String centerId)
    Books a slot for a user at a specific gym center on a given date and slot ID.
    void
    cancelBookingById(String bookingId)
    Cancels a booking identified by its booking ID.
    List<FlipFitSlot>
    getAvailableSlots(String centerId, Date date)
    Retrieves available slots for booking at a specific gym center on a given date.
    List<FlipFitBooking>
    getCustomerBookings(String customerId)
    Retrieves bookings made by a customer identified by their customer ID.
    List<UserPlan>
    getCustomerPlan(String userName)
    Retrieves the plan(s) subscribed by a customer identified by their username.
    List<FlipFitGymCenter>
    getGymCentersListByCity(String city)
    Retrieves details of all gym centers in a specific city.
    boolean
    isUserValid(String userName, String password)
    Checks if a user with the provided username and password exists and is valid.

    Registers a new customer with the provided details.
    FlipFitCustomer
    viewMyProfile(String userName)
    Retrieves the profile details of a customer identified by their username.

  • Method Details

    • registerCustomer

      void registerCustomer(String username, String email, String password, String phoneNumber, String govId)
      Registers a new customer with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the customer
      password - Password of the customer
      email - Email of the customer
      phoneNumber - Phone number of the customer
      govId - of the customer

    • getGymCentersListByCity

      List<FlipFitGymCenter> getGymCentersListByCity(String city)
      Retrieves details of all gym centers in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - City name
      Returns:
      List of gym center details

    • getAvailableSlots

      List<FlipFitSlot> getAvailableSlots(String centerId, Date date)
      Retrieves available slots for booking at a specific gym center on a given date.
      Parameters:
      centerId - ID of the gym center
      date - Date for which slots are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of available slots

    • getCustomerBookings

      List<FlipFitBooking> getCustomerBookings(String customerId)
      Retrieves bookings made by a customer identified by their customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the customer
      Returns:
      List of customer bookings

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(String customerId, Date date, String slotId, String centerId)
      Books a slot for a user at a specific gym center on a given date and slot ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the user making the booking
      date - Date of the booking
      slotId - ID of the slot (time slot) to book
      centerId - ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      True if booking is successful, false otherwise

    • cancelBookingById

      void cancelBookingById(String bookingId)
      Cancels a booking identified by its booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - ID of the booking to cancel

    • getCustomerPlan

      List<UserPlan> getCustomerPlan(String userName)
      Retrieves the plan(s) subscribed by a customer identified by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the customer
      Returns:
      List of plans subscribed by the customer

    • isUserValid

      boolean isUserValid(String userName, String password)
      Checks if a user with the provided username and password exists and is valid.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the user
      password - Password of the user
      Returns:
      True if the user is valid, false otherwise

    • viewMyProfile

      FlipFitCustomer viewMyProfile(String userName)
      Retrieves the profile details of a customer identified by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the customer
      Returns:
      Customer profile information
